channel.title: Intent on Everyday Theory
channel.description: Recent content in Intent on Everyday Theory

item.title: Express Intent
item.description: Sometimes, it’s what you don’t say that hurts you the most. Let’s go. Side Effects A warning before we begin, I will use the words “side effects” heavily in this post. I come at this from the functional school of thought. Quite honestly, in said school of thought, “side” effects can be the very necessary things your system does. Writing to a database is technically a side effect. If something happens in the system outside the expected return value, then I will refer to it as a “side effect”.
